dedup.name: dedup
dedup.description: Removes duplicates from a list of records.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The list of fields used to deduplicate

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If you want to pick a particular record out of the duplicates, you can use the sort parameter

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Reduces the number of records in a list by keeping only those records that match the specified condition.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition to keep the records.

filterOut.description: Removes records that match a specific condition.
filterOut.name: filterOut

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition to keep the records.

search.name: search
search.description: Searches for records that match the specified search condition.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition used when searching for records.

traverse.name: traverse
syntax: traverse edgeType, …, targetType, … [, direction] [, fieldsKeep: field, …] [, nodeId]
traverse.description:
Traverses source nodes to target nodes in the specified direction, following edge types defined by edgeTypes.

The traverse command follows the smartscapeNodes command. As an input for the source node, it takes records containing nodeId.

parameters.name: edgeTypes
parameters.description: The type of the edge to be traversed (one or more).

parameters.name: targetTypes
parameters.description: The type of the target node (one or more).

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: The field that contains the id of the source node that should be traversed

parameters.name: fieldsKeep
parameters.description: A list of fields from the source node that should be preserved in dt.traverse.history column.
